entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
